document_data.mainbody:
Molar was a shopkeep and a blacksmith from Skull Crag in the Storm Horn Mountains of Cormyr in the 14 century DR.
Molar was an aging human with gray hair and impressive musculature of a hard-working smith.
By the 1360s DR, Molar ran two shops, Molars Artful Armourer and Molars Very Well-Equipped Voyager. Theyre their doors right next to each other with Very Well-Equipped Voyager door to the south and Artful Armourer to the west. Each of the shops had a sign with its name. However, once a customer entered either door, they quickly realized that both doors led to a single. Molars home could be accessed from the back of the shop, and it had a second entrance at the back of the building.
